item.description:
Barbara suggested going to see Love and Other Drugs or Due Date tomorrow (Sunday). The shows start at 11:00 and 11:30, so if you'd like to go (tickets are up to you, no discounts, sorry!), meet with Barbara at 10:45 in the ticket lobby of the AMC Framingham.

She'd like to go to American Joe's after the movie for a bit of lunch, as well. If you're up for that, too, enjoy!

Please comment on this thread to talk about it. I won't be able to answer any questions about this meetup, as it's not my get-together!

--Dana
item.name: NoOrg--Tomorrow--Love and other Drugs OR Due Date
